pages.text: When a $(thing)hostile mob$() is killed, it will drop $(thing)little blue and yellow diamond-shaped orbs$(). These orbs are known as $(item)Munny$() and are used for $(thing)currency$() in Kingdom Keys. Either using them at the $(moogle)Moogles$() to pay for $(l:kingdomkeys:learning_the_menu/item_tab)items or other equipment$(). You can also use $(l)/kingdomkeys paymunny [Username] [Amount]$() in multiplayer to $(thing)pay another player$().
